channel.title: Server-side Walking
channel.description:
I am trying to make it so I can specify a X and Y cord. and the player will WALK to that location, not teleport. However, walking in client.java is scanned from the packets sent by the client.
If anyone can show me how to do this I'll give them a free JMod account on my server :P
